biotools.summary: Plant cytochrome P450 database and web-based tools for structural construction and ligand docking. It is a reliable template-based structure prediction method (PCPCM), and predicted the structures of 180 plant P450s with known functions. In addition, we developed a method for docking plant P450s with ligands (PCPLD). Both PCPCM and PCPLD were available for users on the webserver.
